ShortDescription.Value: Adds a simple (persistent) notification on the Menu

Publish.LongDescription:
I'm a simple man; I see "{X} Mod Loaded", I start playing.
This mod adss a ==persistent== notification to the Main Menu (and also Pause Menu), showing how many mods have loaded in this session.
If for some reason a broken mod prevents other mods from loading, just by looking at the number you can recognize something is wrong.
You can also see a list of the (current/last) loaded mods on the Log file loacted here: * `%LocalAppData%Low/Colossal Order/Cities Skylines II/Logs/SimpleModChecker.Mod.log`
Safe to remove.
